mapper.select: SELECT a.id, a.user_id , a.shop_id , a.pnum, a.phone, a.ordertime, a.order_money, a.roomtype, b.phone userPhone, c.shopName shopName FROM shoporder a LEFT JOIN USER b ON a.user_id = b.id LEFT JOIN shop c ON a.shop_id = c.id WHERE a.user_id= #{userId}

SELECT shoporder.*, USER.phone userPhone, shop.shopName shopName FROM shoporder LEFT JOIN USER ON shoporder.user_id = USER.id LEFT JOIN shop ON shoporder.shop_id = shop.id WHERE shoporder.shop_id = #{shopId}
